passage_text: Anonymous. Good question! “Usako” is a nickname Mamoru gave to Usagi. “Usa” is shortening her name (it also means rabbit) and-ko is a suffix at the end of a name, which usually means “girl” or “child”. Not only is it used in real names, it’s also used in nicknames.

Answer by Kuribou. Confidence votes 6.4K. The word 'usagi' means rabbit, but if used as a name, it could be composed of many different combinations of Kanji and have a variety of meanings. I would have to see the Kanji to determine the actual meaning.

It means Bunny (or Rabbit, Hare, etc.) It does NOT mean Serena. Ever. The English version of Sailor Moon just shortened Serenity (as in princess Serenity) and turned it into Serena for her name instead of Usagi. Rini does not mean bunny either.

In Japanese, the name Usagi means-bunny.The name Usagi originated as an Japanese name. The name Usagi is a unisex name and can be used for a boy or girl name (male or female). Japanese Name Meaning-bunny. Origin-Japan. Global Star Registery-Name a star after someone special!

Usagi's origin is Japanese. Usagi is of the meaning resembling a rabbit. The names Usagee, Usagey, Usagie, and Usagy are derivatives of Usagi. Usagi is seldom used as a baby name for girls. It is not in the top 1000 names.
